computation_units: Percentage of Canadians 15 years of age and older
graph_title: Proportion of young women and men aged 18–29 years who experienced sexual violence by age 18
indicator_name: Proportion of young women and men aged 18–29 years who experienced sexual violence by age 18
SDG_GOAL: Goal 16: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
SDG_TARGET: Target 16.2: End abuse, exploitation, trafficking and all forms of violence against and torture of children
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 16.2.3: Proportion of young women and men aged 18-29 years who experienced sexual violence by age 18
REC_USE_LIM: Percent calculation includes all Canadians 15 years of age and older. Sexual violence includes incidents which occurred before the victim was 15 years of age, and only those incidents committed by an adult.
SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Goal 16: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Target 16.2: End abuse, exploitation, trafficking and all forms of violence against and torture of children
SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL: Indicator 16.2.3: Proportion of young women and men aged 18-29 years who experienced sexual violence by age 18
goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 208 KB)
source_url_text_1: Self-reported child maltreatment, by sex, Canada, 2014
UNIT_OF_MEASURE: Percentage of Canadians 15 years of age and older

fr.SDG_TARGET: 16.2 Mettre un terme à la maltraitance, à l'exploitation et à la traite, et à toutes les formes de violence et de torture dont sont victimes les enfants
fr.SDG_INDICATOR: 16.2.3 Proportion de jeunes femmes et hommes de 18 à 29 ans ayant été victimes de violences sexuelles avant l'âge de 18 ans
fr.REC_USE_LIM: Le calcul du pourcentage comprend tous les Canadiens âgés de 15 ans et plus. La violence sexuelle comprend les incidents qui sont survenus avant que la victime n'atteigne l'âge de 15 ans et seulement les actes qui ont été commis par un adulte.
fr.SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: 16.2 Mettre un terme à la maltraitance, à l'exploitation et à la traite, et à toutes les formes de violence et de torture dont sont victimes les enfants
fr.SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL: 16.2.3 Proportion de jeunes femmes et hommes de 18 à 29 ans ayant été victimes de violences sexuelles avant l'âge de 18 ans
fr.source_url_text_1: Mauvais traitements subis durant l'enfance et autodéclarés, selon le sexe de la victime, Canada, 2014 - Tableau 1.1
fr.UNIT_OF_MEASURE: Percentage of Canadians 15 years of age and older
